name: Out there (Rimmerworld)
description:
You've just bought a brand new space ship. The objective is to fly around space, fight pirates while travelling, buy and sell goods, and make profit!


Modifiers:

  • Self-Made - Technically no assets were used, all it is is ASCII art done by me. I'm not sure if that counts... Maybe?
  • Duochrome - Only the colour black, white, and the alpha channel has been used in this project. Not a drop of colour Yes, I hope this counts
  • It's What We Do - Nope
  • And Here, We See the Wild Programmer - Also nope
  • Back in My Day We Didn't Need No Polygons - Everything in the game has been made only using the Terminus TTF (available here: https://files.ax86.net/terminus-ttf/). No assets. Only text. So yes.
